hudify.messages.premium_required: Spotify Premium is required for this feature
hudify.midnightconfig.title: Hudify Config
hudify.midnightconfig.poll_rate.tooltip:
How often to send an API request to Spotify to refresh variables, in milliseconds
WARNING: Too low a value can cause you to hit Spotify ratelimits!
hudify.midnightconfig.inactive_poll_rate:
How often to poll Spotify's API when the Spotify isn't running, in seconds.
Setting this too long will increase the time for Hudify to notice when you first start playing music.
For example if you set this to 60 seconds, then start playing, you'll have up to a 60 second delay before Hudify displays anything
hudify.midnightconfig.scrub_name.tooltip:
If disabled, makes {sp_fancy_track} just return the track name without scrubbing anything.
Saves a tiny bit of processing power if you're not using the variable
hudify.midnightconfig.truncate_length.to:
Truncate long variables after this many characters.
Applies to artists, albums, and track names.
Set to -1 to never truncate
hudify.midnightconfig.db.tooltip: Logs extra debug info. Very spammy
hudify.midnightconfig.CLIENT_ID.tooltip: The Client ID for your Spotify app. See readme
